message:
Title: Kangaroo Court in a War Zone

In 2024's bleak forecast,
Kyiv's terms, Kremlin casts as too vast.
But nix cynicism,
Find late optimism,
In the play where peace finally gets cast.
prompt: Russia-Ukraine war: Kremlin says engaging in peace talks on Kyiv’s terms ‘unrealistic’ – as it happened 2.45pm GMT Closing summary The time in Kyiv is 4.45pm. Here’s a round-up of the day’s headlines: The Kremlin said on Friday that the idea Russia would engage in peace talks with Ukraine on Kyiv’s terms in 2024 was unrealistic. It was responding to a media report that said Washington wanted such a scenario to unfold, Reuters reported. Kremlin
